General.Name: International Tower Hill Mines Ltd
General.Description: International Tower Hill Mines Ltd., a development stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company holds a 100% interest in the Livengood gold project covering an area of approximately 19,546 hectares located in the northwest of Fairbanks, Alaska. The company was formerly known as Tower Hill Mines Ltd. and changed its name to International Tower Hill Mines Ltd. in March 1991. International Tower Hill Mines Ltd. was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 200 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1S4
